description.lang: In flush Z-Wave switch with double output

inclusionNote.lang: Press service button S for more than 2 second or press push button I1 three times within 3s (3 times change switch state within 3 seconds).

description.lang: basic on/off (triggered at change of the output Q2 state and reflecting its state)
power meter report (triggered at change of the output Q1 state and reflecting its state)
switch binary report (triggered at change of the output Q1 state and reflecting its state)
einfache Ein-/Ausschaltfunktion (durch Änderung des Output Status ausgelöst und dessen Status reflektierend)
basic on/off (triggered at change of the output state and reflecting its state)
Lifeline
Lifeline
switch binary report (triggered at change of the output Q2 state and reflecting its state)
power meter report (triggered at change of the output Q2 state and reflecting its state)
multilevel sensor report (triggered at change of temperature sensor)
monostabiler Schaltertyp (Druckknopf)
mono-stable switch type (push button)
bistabiler Schaltertyp
bi-stable switch type
mono-stable switch type (push button)
bi-stable switch type

name.lang: Aktiviert / Deaktiviert Funktionen ALLES AN/ALLES AUS
Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON/ALL OFF

description.lang: Flush 1D Relaismodul antwortet auf Befehle ALLES AN/ ALLES AUS, die durch die Hauptsteuerung oder durch andere dem System zugehörige Steuerungen gesendet werden.
On/Off module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF that may be sent by the main controller or by other controller belonging to the system.
ALLES AN ist nicht aktiv, ALLES AUS ist nicht aktiv
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALLES AN ist nicht aktiv, ALLES AUS ist aktiviert
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALLES AN ist aktiviert, ALLES AUS ist nicht aktiv
ALL ON active ALL OFF is not active
ALLES AN ist aktiviert, ALLES AUS ist aktiviert
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

name.lang: Automatic turning off output Q1 after set time

description.lang: Mittels diesem Parameter geht das eingeschaltete Relais nach bestimmter Zeit automatisch AUS. Jedesmal wenn das Modul einen Einschaltbefehl erhält, wird der Timer auf Null zurückgesetzt, unabhängig davon, wo der Befehl ausgelöst wird (Druckknopf, verbundenes Modul, Kontroller,...)

When relay Q1 is ON it goes automatically OFF after time defined by this parameter. Timer is reset to zero each time the module receive ON command regardless from where it comes (push button, associated module, controller,..).
Automatisch AUS ist deaktiviert
Auto OFF disabled
32535 Sekunden (325,35s) Automatisch AUS mit Zeiteinstellung, Sekundenschritt liegt bei 1s oder 10ms entsprechend Parameter Nr. 15
32535 seconds (325,35s) Auto OFF enabled with define time, step is 1s or 10ms according to parameter nr.15

name.lang: Automatic turning on output Q1 after set time

description.lang: Mittels diesem Parameter geht das ausgeschaltete Relais nach bestimmter Zeit automatisch AN. Jedesmal wenn das Modul einen Abschaltbefehl erhält, wird der Timer auf Null zurückgesetzt, unabhängig davon, wo der Befehl ausgelöst wird (Druckknopf, verbundenes Modul, Kontroller,...)

When relay is OFF it goes automatically ON after time defined by this parameter. Timer is reset to zero each time the module receive OFF command regardless from where it comes (push button, associated module, controller,..).
Auto AN deaktiviert
Auto ON disabled
32536 Sekunden (325,35s) Auto AN aktiviert mit Zeiteinstellung, Sekundenschritt liegt bei 1s oder 10ms ensprechend Parameter Nr. 15
32536 seconds (325,35s) Auto ON enabled with define time, step is 1s or 10ms according to parameter nr.15
Automatische Ein-/Ausschalt-Ansteuerung in Sekunden oder Millisekunden
Automatic turning off / on seconds or milliseconds selection. Note that parameter is valid for both outputs Q1, Q2 and is the same for turning off or on.
Sekundentakt angewählt
seconds selected
Millisekundentakt angewählt
milliseconds selected

name.lang: Saving the state of the relay after a power failure

description.lang: Flush 2 relay module saves its state before power failure (it returns to the last position saved before a power failure).
Flush 2 relay module does not save the state after a power failure, it returns to "off" position.
Set value means the type of the device that is connected to the output. The device type can be normally open (NO) or normally close (NC).
Bei ausgeschaltenem System liegen am Ausgang 0V (NC)
When system is turned off the output is 0V (NC).
Bei eingeschaltenem System liegen am Ausgang 230V oder 24V (NO).
When system is turned off the output is 230V or 24V (NO).
Der eingestellte Wert wird zum aktuell gemessenen Sensorwert dazu gerechnet oder von diesem abgezogen.
Set value is added or subtracted to actual measured value by sensor.
Offset beträgt 0.0°C
offset is 0.0°C
Wert zwischen 0.1°C und 10.0°C wird zur aktuell gemessenen Temperatur hinzuaddiert
Value from 0.1 °C to 10.0 °C is added to actual measured temperature.
Wert zwischen -0.1°C und -10.0°C wird von der aktuell gemessenen Temperatur subtrahiert.
Value from -0.1 °C to -10.0 °C is subtracted to actual measured temperature.
Wenn der digitale Temperatursensor angeschlossen ist, meldet das Modul die gemessene Temperatur bei durch den Parameter definiertem Temperaturwechsel
If digital temperature sensor is connected, module reports measured temperature on temperature change defined by this parameter.
Reporting disabled
Define the temperature change that is reported.

name.lang: Automatic turning off output Q2 after set time

description.lang: When relay Q2 is ON it goes automatically OFF after time defined by this parameter. Timer is reset to zero each time the module receive ON command regardless from where it comes (push button, associated module, gateway,..).
Auto OFF disabled
1second (0,01s) – 32535 seconds (325,35s) Auto OFF enabled with define time, step is 1s or 10ms according to parameter nr.15

name.lang: Automatic turning on output Q2 after set time

description.lang: When relay Q2 is OFF it goes automatically ON after time defined by this parameter. Timer is reset to zero each time the module receive OFF command regardless from where it comes (push button, associated module, gateway,..).
Auto ON disabled
1second (0,01s) – 32536 seconds (325,35s) Auto ON enabled with define time, step is 1s or 10ms according to parameter nr.15

name.lang: Power reporting in Watts on power change for Q1

description.lang: Set value means percentage, set value from 0 – 100 = 0% - 100%.
Reporting Disabled
Power report is send (push) only when actual power in Watts in real time changes for more than set percentage comparing to previous actual power in Watts, step is 1%.

name.lang: Power reporting in Watts on power change for Q2

description.lang: Set value means percentage, set value from 0 – 100 = 0% - 100%.
Reporting Disabled
Reporting enabled. Power report is send (push) only when actual power in Watts in real time changes for more than set percentage comparing to previous actual power in Watts, step is 1%.

name.lang: Power reporting in Watts by time interval for Q1

description.lang: Set value means time interval (0 – 32535) in seconds, when power report is send.
Reporting Disabled
Reporting enabled, Power report is send with time interval set by entered value.

name.lang: Power reporting in Watts by time interval for Q2

description.lang: Set value means time interval (0 – 32535) in seconds, when power report is send.
Reporting Disabled
Reporting enabled, Power report is send with time interval set by entered value.
Set value means the type of the device that is connected to the PWM output. The device type can be normally open (NO) or normally close (NC).
When system is turned off the output is 0V (NC).
When system is turned off the output is 230V (NO).
Group 1: Lifeline group, 0 nodes allowed. Group 2: multilevel sensor report (triggered at change of temperature sensor) up to 16 nodes.

Group 1: Lifeline group, 0 nodes allowed. Group 2: basic on/off (triggered at change of the output Q2 state and reflecting its state) up to 16 nodes. Group 3: switch binary report (triggered at change of the output Q2 state and reflecting its state) up to 16 nodes. Group 4: power meter report (triggered at change of the output Q2 state and reflecting its state) up to 16 nodes.

Group 1: Lifeline group, 0 nodes allowed. Group 2: basic on/off (triggered at change of the output Q1 state and reflecting its state) up to 16 nodes. Group 3: switch binary report (triggered at change of the output Q1 state and reflecting its state) up to 16 nodes. Group 4: power meter report (triggered at change of the output Q1 state and reflecting its state) up to 16 nodes.
